verses.t: And{G2532} he began{G756} to speak{G3004} unto them{G846} by{G1722} parables{G3850}. A certain man{G444} planted{G5452} a vineyard{G290}, and{G2532} set{G4060} an hedge about{G5418} it, and{G2532} digged{G3736} a place for the winefat{G5276}, and{G2532} built{G3618} a tower{G4444}, and{G2532} let{G1554} it{G846} out{G1554} to husbandmen{G1092}, and{G2532} went into a far country{G589}.

And{G2532} at the season{G3588} he sent{G649} to{G4314} the husbandmen{G3588} a servant{G1401}, that{G2443} he might receive{G2983} from{G3844} the husbandmen{G3588} of{G575} the fruit{G3588} of the vineyard{G3588}.
And{G1161} they caught{G2983} him, and{G2532} beat{G1194} him{G846}, and sent{G649} him away{G649} empty{G2756}.

And{G2532} again{G3825} he sent{G649} unto{G4314} them{G846} another{G243} servant{G1401}; and at him{G2548} they cast stones{G3036}, and wounded{G2775} him in the head{G2775}, and{G2532} sent{G649} him away{G649} shamefully handled{G821}.
And{G2532} again{G3825} he sent{G649} another{G243}; and him{G2548} they killed{G615}, and{G2532} many{G4183} others{G243}; beating{G1194} some{G3588}, and{G1161} killing{G615} some{G3588}.

Having{G2192} yet{G2089} therefore{G3767} one{G1520} son{G5207}, his{G846} wellbeloved{G27}, he sent{G649} him{G846} also{G2532} last{G2078} unto{G4314} them{G846}, saying{G3004}, They will reverence{G1788} my{G3450} son{G3588}.UNSURE: Can not find anywhere for "hoti".

But{G1161} those{G1565} husbandmen{G3588} said{G2036} among{G4314} themselves{G1438}, This{G3778} is{G2076} the heir{G3588}; come{G1205}, let us kill{G615} him{G846}, and{G2532} the inheritance{G3588} shall be{G2071} ours{G2257}.UNSURE: The word "hoti"
And{G2532} they took{G2983} him{G846}, and killed{G615} him, and{G2532} cast{G1544} him out of{G1854} the vineyard{G3588}.

What{G5101} shall{G3588} therefore{G3767} the lord{G2962} of the vineyard{G3588} do{G4160}? he will come{G2064} and{G2532} destroy{G622} the husbandmen{G3588}, and{G2532} will give{G1325} the vineyard{G3588} unto others{G243}.
And have ye{G314} not{G3761} read{G314} this{G3778} scripture{G3588}; The stone{G3037} which{G3739} the builders{G3618} rejected{G593} is{G3778} become{G1096} the head{G2776} of the corner{G1137}:
This{G3778} was{G3844} the Lord's{G2962} doing{G1096}, and{G2532} it is{G2076} marvellous{G2298} in{G1722} our{G2257} eyes{G3788}?

And{G2532} they sought{G2212} to lay hold{G2902} on him{G846}, but{G2532} feared{G5399} the people{G3588}: for{G1063} they knew{G1097} that{G3754} he had spoken{G2036} the parable{G3588} against{G4314} them{G846}: and they left{G863} him{G846}, and{G2532} went their way{G565}.
And{G2532} they send{G649} unto{G4314} him{G846} certain{G5100} of the Pharisees{G3588} and{G2532} of the Herodians{G3588}, to{G2443} catch{G64} him{G846} in{G3056} his words{G3056}.

And when{G1161} they were come{G2064}, they say{G3004} unto him{G846}, Master{G1320}, we know{G1492} that{G3754} thou art{G1488} true{G227}, and{G2532} carest{G3199} for{G4012} no man{G3762}: for{G1063} thou regardest{G991} not{G3756} the person{G4383} of men{G444}, but{G235} teachest{G1321} the way{G3588} of God{G3588} in{G1909} truth{G225}: Is it lawful{G1832} to give{G1325} tribute{G2778} to Cæsar{G2541}, or{G2228} not{G3756}?

Shall we give{G1325}, or{G2228} shall we{G1325} not{G3361} give{G1325}? But{G1161} he{G3588}, knowing{G1492} their{G846} hypocrisy{G3588}, said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Why{G5101} tempt ye{G3985} me{G3165}? bring{G5342}me{G3427} a penny{G1220}, that{G2443} I may see{G1492} it.

And{G1161} they brought{G5342} it. And{G2532} he saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Whose{G5101} is this{G3778} image{G3588} and{G2532} superscription{G3588}? And{G1161} they said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Cæsar's{G2541}.

And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} answering{G611} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Render{G591} to Cæsar{G2541} the things that are{G3588} Cæsar's{G2541}, and{G2532} to God{G3588} the things that are{G3588} God's{G3588}. And{G2532} they marvelled{G2296} at{G1909} him{G846}.
Then{G2532} come{G2064} unto{G4314} him{G846} the Sadducees{G4523}, which{G3748} say{G3004} there is{G1511} no{G3361} resurrection{G386}; and{G2532} they asked{G1905} him{G846}, saying{G3004},

Master{G1320}, Moses{G3475} wrote{G1125} unto us{G2254}, If{G1437} a man's{G5100} brother{G80} die{G599}, and{G2532} leave{G2641} his wife{G1135} behind him, and{G2532} leave{G863} no{G3361} children{G5043}, that{G2443} his{G846} brother{G3588} should take{G2983} his{G846} wife{G3588}, and{G2532} raise up{G1817} seed{G4690} unto his{G846} brother{G3588}.UNSURE: Of placement of "hoti".
Now there were{G2258} seven{G2033} brethren{G80}: and{G2532} the first{G4413} took{G2983} a wife{G1135}, and{G2532} dying{G599} left{G863} no{G3756} seed{G4690}.
And{G2532} the second{G1208} took{G2983} her{G846}, and{G2532} died{G599}, neither{G3761} left{G863} he{G846} any seed{G4690}: and{G2532} the third{G5154} likewise{G5615}.
And{G2532} the seven{G2033} had{G2983} her{G846}, and{G2532} left{G863} no{G3756} seed{G4690}: last{G2078} of all{G3956} the woman{G3588} died{G599} also{G2532}.

In{G1722} the resurrection{G386} therefore{G3767}, when{G3752} they shall rise{G450}, whose{G5101} wife{G1135} shall she be{G2071} of them{G846}? for{G1063} the seven{G2033} had{G2192} her{G846} to wife{G1135}.

And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} answering{G611} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Do ye{G4105} not{G3756} therefore{G5124} err{G4105}, because{G1223} ye know{G1492} not{G3361} the scriptures{G3588}, neither{G3366} the power{G3588} of God{G3588}?

For{G1063} when{G3752} they shall rise{G450} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}, they{G1060} neither{G3777} marry{G1060}, nor{G3777} are given in marriage{G1061}; but{G235} are{G1526} as{G5613} the angels{G32} which are{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}.

And{G1161} as touching{G4012} the dead{G3498}, that{G3754} they rise{G1453}: have ye{G314} not{G3756} read{G314} in{G1722} the book{G3588} of Moses{G3475}, how{G5613} in{G1909} the bush{G942} God{G3588} spake{G2036} unto him{G846}, saying{G3004}, I{G1473} am the God{G3588} of Abraham{G11}, and{G2532} the God{G3588} of Isaac{G2464}, and{G2532} the God{G3588} of Jacob{G2384}?
He is{G2076} not{G3756} the God{G3588} of the dead{G3498}, but{G235} the God{G2316}of the living{G2198}: ye{G5210} therefore{G3767} do{G4105} greatly{G4183} err{G4105}.

And{G2532} one{G1520} of the scribes{G3588} came{G4334}, and having heard{G191} them{G846} reasoning together{G4802}, and perceiving{G1492} that{G3754} he had answered{G611} them{G846} well{G2573}, asked{G1905} him{G846}, Which{G4169} is{G2076} the first{G4413} commandment{G1785} of all{G3956}?

And{G1161} Jesus{G2424} answered{G611} him{G846}, The first{G4413} of all{G3956} the commandments{G3588} is, Hear{G191}, O Israel{G2474}; The Lord{G2962} our{G2257} God{G3588} is{G2076} one{G1520} Lord{G2962}:UNSURE: Of "hoti"

And{G2532} thou shalt love{G25} the Lord{G2962} thy{G4675} God{G3588} with{G1537} all{G3650} thy{G4675} heart{G3588}, and{G2532} with{G1537} all{G3650} thy{G4675} soul{G3588}, and{G2532} with{G1537} all{G3650} thy{G4675} mind{G3588}, and{G2532} with{G1537} all{G3650} thy{G4675} strength{G3588}: this{G3778} is the first{G4413} commandment{G1785}.

And{G2532} the second{G1208} is like{G3664}, namely this{G846}, Thou shalt love{G25} thy{G4675} neighbour{G4139} as{G5613} thyself{G4572}. There is{G2076} none{G3756} other{G243} commandment{G1785} greater{G3187} than these{G5130}.NOTE: Extra word: "autei"

And{G2532} the scribe{G3588} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Well{G2573}, Master{G1320}, thou hast said{G2036} the truth{G225}: for{G3754} there is{G2076} one{G1520} God{G2316}; and{G2532} there is{G2076} none{G3756} other{G243} but{G4133} he{G846}:

And{G2532} to love{G25} him{G846} with{G1537} all{G3650} the heart{G3588}, and{G2532} with{G1537} all{G3650} the understanding{G3588}, and{G2532} with{G1537} all{G3650} the soul{G3588}, and{G2532} with{G1537} all{G3650} the strength{G3588}, and{G2532} to love{G25} his neighbour{G4139} as{G5613} himself{G1438}, is{G2076} more{G4119} than all{G3956} whole burnt offerings{G3588} and{G2532} sacrifices{G3588}.

And{G2532} when Jesus{G3588} saw{G1492} that{G3754} he answered{G611} discreetly{G3562}, he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Thou art{G1488} not{G3756} far{G3112} from{G575} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}. And{G2532} no man{G3762} after that{G3765} durst{G5111} ask{G1905} him{G846} any question.UNSURE: Where to tag "auton".

And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} and said{G3004}, while he taught{G1321} in{G1722} the temple{G3588}, How{G4459} say{G3004} the scribes{G3588} that{G3754} Christ{G3588} is{G2076} the Son{G5207} of David{G1138}?

For{G1063} David{G1138} himself{G846} said{G2036} by{G1722} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G3588}, LordThe {G3588} said{G2036} to my{G3450} Lord{G3588}, Sit thou{G2521} on{G1537} my{G3450} right hand{G1188}, till{G2193} I make{G5087} thine{G4675} enemies{G2190} thy{G4675} footstool{G5286}.

David{G1138} therefore{G3767} himself{G846} calleth{G3004} him{G846}Lord{G2962}; and{G2532} whence{G4159} is he{G2076} then his{G846} son{G5207}? And{G2532} the common{G4183} people{G3793} heard{G191} him{G846} gladly{G2234}.

And{G2532} he said{G3004} unto them{G846} in{G1722} his{G846} doctrine{G3588}, Beware{G991} of{G575} the scribes{G3588}, which{G3588} love{G2309} to go{G4043} in{G1722} long clothing{G4749}, and{G2532} love salutations{G783} in{G1722} the marketplaces{G3588},
And{G2532} the chief seats{G4410} in{G1722} the synagogues{G3588}, and{G2532} the uppermost rooms{G4411} at{G1722} feasts{G3588}:
Which{G3588} devour{G2719} widows'{G3588} houses{G3588}, and{G2532} for a pretence{G4392} make{G4336} long{G3117} prayers{G4336}: these{G3778} shall receive{G2983} greater{G4053} damnation{G2917}.

And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} sat{G2523} over against{G2713} the treasury{G3588}, and beheld{G2334} how{G4459} the people{G3588} cast{G906} money{G5475} into{G1519} the treasury{G3588}: and{G2532} many{G4183} that were rich{G4145} cast{G906} in much{G4183}.
And{G2532} there came{G2064} a certain{G1520} poor{G4434} widow{G5503}, and she threw in{G906} two{G1417} mites{G3016}, which{G3739} make{G2076} a farthing{G2835}.

And{G2532} he called{G4341} unto him his{G846} disciples{G3588}, and saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Verily{G281} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, That{G3754} this{G3778} poor{G4434} widow{G3588} hath cast{G906} more{G4119} in{G906}, than all{G3956} they which{G3588} have cast{G906} into{G1519} the treasury{G3588}:

For{G1063} all{G3956} they did cast in{G906} of{G1537} their{G846} abundance{G4052}; but{G1161} she{G846} of{G1537} her{G846} want{G3588} did cast in{G906} all{G3956} that{G3745} she had{G2192}, even all{G3650} her{G846} living{G3588}.NOTE: Extra word. "autei"
